Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Investments[ENDCOLOR] replaces Gold-rushing Buildings. Instead, you use gold to 'Invest' in a Building or Wonder, thereby reducing its base Production cost.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Investing in a Puppet or Colony will incline the AI to focus on that Building. However, in these cities, the Magistrate resource can be used to rush Buildings instead.
Requires Commerce. Cost of [ICON_INVEST] Investments reduced by 15% in all cities.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Mercantilism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_INVEST] Investments in Buildings or Units reduce their [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production cost by an additional 15%. +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from every Mint, Market, Bank, and Stock Exchange.
